website_summaries.verdict: A super sleek rotisserie oven with plenty of features and backed by a 3-year warranty.
pros: Looks great on a countertop and is deep enough to fit a 12" pizza
12 cooking functions including rotisserie and convection modes
Easy-to-read digital display with a backlight and heat sensor for maintaining an even interior temperature
cons: There's no interior light and although there's space for it, a second rack isn't included

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday appliance and rotisserie!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this appliance. I use it daily and trust the quality of the appliance. But one thing is the knob lettering is fading. I still recommend it to everyone that sees it. My cooks are consistent and there is no noise for all it does. I’ve used the rotisserie function over 20 times and it does a great job! Quick tip: every time you start/stop the rotisserie function it changes the direction of the turn. Just in case you set up your cook to render/have the fat flow out a certain direction.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Buzon

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not durable
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it lasted. Unfortunately, it is less than two years old and has started tripping the circuit breaker while warming up. Forget about using it again unless you want to burn your house down.
customer_reviews.author: metis68

customer_reviews.title: For $100, great convection/toaster oven.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was a steal. Previously listed much higher, this was a steal at the price reduction. Bakes very good. Includes rotisserie rack, includes a drip pan. The blue light never turns off. Or at least I haven’t figured out how to turn it off. The blue light staying on is my only dislike. The rotating dial has a learning curve, but easy enough after a few tries with it. Update: Blue LED does turn off after 10 minutes of non-use.
customer_reviews.author: The Boss

customer_reviews.title: Giver her a try!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first rotisserie and I chose the Cuisnart due to great results from their other products. We have had many excellent dinners with the rotisserie as we don’t really have a need for the other features. Placing the meat on the skewers is tricky and if not done properly, results in the meat browning unevenly. Also, when the timer goes off, leave the meat or poultry in there for at least 10 minutes. This way the skin or outside can maintain its crispness.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie A.

customer_reviews.title: You can make Beef Jerkey too!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it..I use it mostly toasting bread, heating tortillas and miniature or square pizza making. I tried the rotisserie chicken and came out great! .... Try to cover the bottom and surround wall for easier cleaning. Read the manual, it is not same timing as regular conventional oven. I also made Beef Jerky, just need to put timer 2 or 3 times. since the max is 2 hours (at 175 F). Also, It does heat up at surrounding areas, so make sure there is enough clearance surrounding toaster. It will be great for WINTER TIME usage here in Houston Tx, I Have not tired making Cakes or pies.. but will soon (in winter).
customer_reviews.author: BusyBody

customer_reviews.title: it makes perfect bacon in the same amount of time as a stove top without the grease pops and shriveling!
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast! I bought this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift he loves it. The convection sections cooks everything very evenly and fast. I fits an entire 12" pizza and actually crisps the edges and crust much better than a normal oven!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad ink that doesn't stick to metal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the toaster/rotesirre. Oven and didn't even get to use it. I was cleaning it and all the the print on the buttons washed off. I am very disappointed. Should I just keep it or go with the hastle to send it back? Bad flaw with China.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Gas Mask Required
customer_reviews.text: Bought first one. Unpacked it. Set it up. Turned it on to Toast. It filled my residence with a smell that could only be described as lighting an entire box of kitchen matches all at once. Returned that unit, got another identical one. Same thing happened. Thought maybe some coating needed to be burned off. Tried bake for 1 hour. Smell was horrendous. Had to run all of my exhaust fans to be able to breath. Let unit cool overnight. Tried to toast the next day. Same choking odor. Returned second unit. Not recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works great. There are a couple small things. 1. Beeper isn't very loud at all. 2. Can't not set timer to start at a specific time. For those who ask. Yes this get VERY hot on the outsides.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM L LARSEN

customer_reviews.title: Put tinfoil over your drip pan when rotisserie is used makes cleaning easier
customer_reviews.text: I never rate products but had to make an exception. I love❤️ This !! We haven’t even touched our conventional oven since we purchased this. Eric even said it even makes darn good toast 😂🤣. I would give it 6 stars if i could 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: tiffany gantt

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this oven works well, so I will just give the one negative I have found. When you cook a rotisserie chicken, it does cook well, but it is difficult to clean the oven. At times the chicken cooking will spatter slightly and the inside of the oven will need cleaning. This included the tray that came with the oven, it was grease stained and hard to clean. Might be better if the tray had a no stick surface on it. Honestly the only complaint I have. It is great to have this and not fire up the full size oven during the summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer9684

customer_reviews.title: Very weird smell/taste
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the oven for maybe three months and while the features are great and I love being able to rotisserie a chicken, there's one huge problem and a one medium problem. 1. I can't get rid of the weird smell which sometimes gets into the taste of food, I've now contacted Cuisinart and I'll provide an update when they contact me. 2. There is no simple way to clean the oven. I'm not a neat freak, but it's an oven. There's splatter, especially from the rotisserie.
customer_reviews.author: Armen

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is impossible
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to give this a higher rating. While it does a great job toasting, baking, and even the rotisserie was amazing in terms of how moist and juicy the chicken came out. BUT and this is a biggie to me...it states it is nonstick and yet after cleaning it for 20 minutes there were still spots that wouldn’t come off. And I attempted the cleaning within about a half hour of the completion of the cooking cycle. So it isn’t like it was left for days or utilized again before cleaning it. This one thing makes it a big disappointment to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ammie

customer_reviews.title: I am very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: 1st Problem: The temp and time #s on display are undecipherable on BOTH the original unit AND the replacement unit. They are unusable and I cannot cook with them. 2nd Problem: I am very unhappy that I cannot get a refund because I did not by this direct from Cuisinart. I will only receive a letter of credit that forces me to buy another Cuisinart product. I do not want another Cuisinart product. I want what this product was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oven in March 2016 and have to throw it out today because the plug melted in the electrical outlet nearly starting a fire. I have used it a lot for baking , toasting etc. and was working fine. About a month ago I noticed that the dial that presets the functions has started skipping and was harder to set the program. I am disappointed that this unit lasted less then two years, it was expensive unit and I thought it will serve me at least 10 years as the previous one I had lasted me about 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: coconut fan

customer_reviews.title: Love this Oven!
customer_reviews.text: I really DO love this "toaster oven"! I have 2 full-size ovens in my kitchen that I hardly ever use since I got this wonderful countertop oven. One of the reasons I bought this model was the rotisserie feature. Sadly, I have used that feature only once. The chicken came out okay, but the problem is that you have to buy a really small chicken for it to spin properly. That is fine, though, because I have a good recipe for roasted chicken that doesn't involve a rotisserie. Love this oven!
customer_reviews.author: M. Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toaster & all around oven
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toaster & all around oven! I love it & cannot find anything to complain about. It has every function you can imagine. I like the convection fan option, it cooks toast perfectly every time. The digital settings are great and easy to use. The rotisserie works great even though it is a bit small. It is good enough for the (2) of us. I wouldn't recommend for a large family, though. This oven heats up better than any other toaster oven I have ever had. My husband even loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Tewes

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to catch this on sale. It is a convection oven so take a few minutes off your cooking times because Convection cooks quicker. I love this so much. It is such a multitasker you can cook anything in it. Be gentle with the pans they are non stick, so heavy degreasers or anything that will scratch it wood, plastic and silicone utensils only.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Watch the price!
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much bought this to cook rotisserie chicken and it works great for that. Very simple to use and has good automatic programs to cook the bird. I have not had to clean it yet, so I can’t comment on that to say if I agree with those complaints. My main advice is to watch the price on Amazon, they seem to vary the price frequently by as much as $35. So wait to get a good price! Overall, a great rotisserie for the money!
customer_reviews.author: GeneralChang

customer_reviews.title: Haven't explored all features - So only 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for... 1) People who don't have space for a full sized stove to offer more tasty fair than your standard toaster oven, tabletop burners and microwaves can provide. 2) People who need a little extra help finishing up huge family meals without using a ton of valuable kitchen real estate 3) ==> ==> People who need to add to their disaster menu selections. I suspect that this product is a better bet to plug into a generator than a standard stove. it can save time and energy to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Chicken and Clean-up is Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: When you line the drip pan with non-stick foil, clean-up is quick. I love the way the chicken stays moist, but not greasy like store-bought rotisserie chicken. It is perfect for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Carriejo

customer_reviews.title: drip pan failed
customer_reviews.text: description said non stick, after first use making chicken on rotisserie, the pan stained like this. it is not non stick and neither is the interior. I hope it holds up, Unit gets very hot on all sides outside, will burn skin. This is not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Al Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After 2 returns we finally received a new appliance which works beautifully. Amazon was excellent on my 2 returns and replaced without any hassles . I am now a satisfied customer. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Cuisinart to replace our old George Foreman and are very disappointed in this product. We paid good money for this and you really can’t even rotisserie a chicken of any size. You can barely get a pork or beef roast in it. My wife has already burnt herself once and the rotisserie is very difficult to use. I wish we could get our money back. We are already exploring replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To Small ..
customer_reviews.text: So I was so excited to get this product. So I can start rotissering chicken. It cooks great. But the problem is the engineers who build it missed alot of details in regards to size and just common sense... it only holds up to 5lb chickens.. Well guess what ??? Most chicken are atleast 5 1/2 or 6 pounds at the store... Duh!!!!! If the designers of this product would have added about 1/2 inch more room inside. and made the turning mechanisms a bit stronger so that it can handle a 5 lbs plus chicken .. It would have been great... This is the result when you try to cut on overhead cost .
customer_reviews.author: G.Horizon

customer_reviews.title: Too small for rotisserie
customer_reviews.text: This works just great but don’t plan to use it as a rotisserie unless it’s the size of a grapefruit! The dial for selecting settings is not very intuitive and I usually get it wrong and have to readjust. I only purchased this model for the rotisserie so that was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: This oven is fantastic! Toasts all bread types perfectly. I even tried toasting naan. Fabulous! I haven't tried the rotisserie. So, can't comment on that. I was concerned that it wasn't going to be user friendly. Happy to say I was wrong. It was very easy to figure out how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Addition
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a new rotisserie and found this Cuisinart multi-use small oven. It fits on our countertop and is very convenient when cooking smaller dinners. No need to turn on the large oven. Extremely versatile and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hawkins (Hawk)

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: I have a few breville countertop appliances and for example quality of knobs on this oven is not comparable. They feel chip and fragile. I chose it because countertop ovens from breville have more bad reviews and the price tag is much higher. I have yet to use the rotisserie function, but I baked, broiled and wormed up in it and it worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Tom Baran

customer_reviews.title: Good easy to use and more features than before.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Cuisinart Rotisserie toaster oven i've owned. I used the first one so frequently that I literally burned it up. This unit is slightly larger than my first, therefore gives provides a larger cooking area. I have used the rotisserie 3 times already and just as before it is easy to use and clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrymann

customer_reviews.title: Best Toaster Oven Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do pretty much everything well. Bagels, toast, pizza, roasting, even the rotisserie works great! I've owned at least 6 toaster ovens over the years, 4 in the last several months. All were returned within days, but this one's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: True Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Over the suggested cooking times are not accurate, this little oven just really cooks well. Huge value. I've used the convection, roast feature, rotisserie, and the bake setting. This oven cooks protein extremely well and it will toast six pieces of bread in less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: JBUICE

customer_reviews.title: Rotisserie is very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 100% for rotisserie and it works good with light small things but I used it for the 3red time today with a chicken that fills it up but still enough room to rotate and the rotator thing that goes through the chicken is barely too short and slips on the rotisserie groove so it wont rotate although the rotator is rotating...complete joke dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy larson

customer_reviews.title: Great oven with small footprint
customer_reviews.text: I needed a toaster oven that used minimal countertop real estate so ordered this one. It was a pleasant surprise that it also functions well — evenly cooks/toasts, user-friendly and has a great interior light that automatically is on when oven is on, which is useful for seeing food and for a visual reminder that oven is on. Only con is that the shelf is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful thing
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a bargain shopper with toaster ovens. I would use it until it was too dirty or broken and get a new one. Not anymore! This is my new little baby and gets used twice a day. I'm extremely pleased with this machine. It heats up quickly and perfectly cooks/toasts items.
customer_reviews.author: Will B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to insert skewers; inside needs a light. Not easy to clean. Even cleaning with a non abrasive cleaner does not clean so well.
customer_reviews.author: MRB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my black & decker toaster oven purchased in 1985 (yes, it was a very good one!). The Cuisinart is much larger, but it does so much more. First thing, made a rotisserie chicken & it was delicious & perfectly cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Smythe

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy and stilll excited about this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy and stilll excited about this product.....it is just what I needed as a lone occupant !! It is a great design, easy to use and doesn't eat up electricity like my full sized oven. I highly and without reservation recommend this product. I am very partial about Cuisinart products and this great convention/rotisserie does not disappoint! LOVE IT... Thank you.!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrayne J.

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: Love at first rotisserie Cornish Hen. Fortyfive minutes to perfection. I can't wait to try a pork loin on the spit. The ease of use is exemplary.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Yes this is amazing.  I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This oven is amazing! We use it all of the time. More than our built in oven. We rotisserie, toast, bake. Just love this oven. It is everything that is described and more. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: realfoodinspired

customer_reviews.title: Great purchased, but wish can be more powerful.
customer_reviews.text: A nice small oven. It can bake and toast, can even cook meat. But it would take more time than a regular oven. Well, no complain if you cook a small piece of meat. Great purchased
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lee

customer_reviews.title: Won’t do a regular size chicken.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the size. I have not been able to find a 4 pound chicken anywhere. The smallest I cam find is a 5 pound chicken. It will not work in the unit. For that reason only I am disappointed. The reason I bought the unit was do do chicken.
customer_reviews.author: brett herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality toast.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I haven’t used all of the features. However, the item I use a toaster oven the most for is toast, which on this machine requires you to flip it or it burns on one side, and isn’t fully toasted on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great,but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the rotisserie feature & for the fact that it’s a countertop oven. I haven’t used the rotisserie feature yet but plan to soon. I have used the oven for baking things & to cook pizza. It’s great... with the exception that there isn’t a light inside the oven...this annoys me,considering the price and brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Suburb quality and cooking options
customer_reviews.text: So glad I upgraded to this oven. Cooks uniformly and cooking options/settings are excellent. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Griffindor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I think it's better than the more expensive version
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it didn't have the slightly elevated running on top and the top exterior finish was easier to clean. Small complaint for the versatility of this oven
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy this item
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy this item. It is very easy to program. I have made bread, rolls, casseroles, etc... You can make just about anything you can make in your conventional oven. It preheats in a matter of minutes. It also holds a 12" pizza stone.
customer_reviews.author: plh315

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new Cuisinart Convection Toaster Oven! Haven't tried all the features yet, but intend to!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chicken
customer_reviews.text: All functions work well. Especially the rotisserie. Perfect for chicken.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Great value oven.
customer_reviews.text: Great oven. Replace my 20 yrs old mini oven and this oven has nearly all the foods that normally bake program in. Let’s see if this one last like the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Panda

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast!!
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove this!!! Heats up quickly!! Cooks food super fast!! Omg and the chicken in this thing is beyond amazing!!! Best investment yet
customer_reviews.author: Luis Pabon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely versatile
customer_reviews.text: I practically replaced my range. Rotisserie chicken, pork roast and even kabob turned out great. Temperatures were true and steady.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: smokes
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it's a fire danger. The door doesn't seal smokes when using as a Rotisserie
customer_reviews.author: michelle almeida

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, too small for purpose, difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to clean is obvious, and size is too small for a family size chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sussman

customer_reviews.title: It works great (so far) and is big enough to handle all ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great (so far) and is big enough to handle all of the smaller oven needs and uses the two of us have.
customer_reviews.author: R U Kidding

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. We use it 2-3 times a week to cook our meals. We bake our own pizza n its great!!!! Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. It works. Messy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Rotisserie is ok for small meats. But a messy process & clean up. Won't be using it too often toast & leftovers mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere For Quality
customer_reviews.text: OMG didn't even last a year and top heating elements went out. My last cuisinart product!
customer_reviews.author: Regular Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the four stars are because it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the four stars are because it does not have an interior light. I bought this oven because it has a rotisserie which works perfectly. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Eden Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Need a flashlight to view what’s cooking
customer_reviews.text: No inside light, dial selector not really user friendly but works well so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But the functionality of the toaster is great.
customer_reviews.text: The only criticism I have is the measurements did not take into account the small "bumps" on the side, and we had a particular place we wanted to place the toaster, and with this additional protrusion, we were unable to. It is now on the counter, and has taken up space that we needed for other purposes. But the functionality of the toaster is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel M. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, with a few small gripes
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now. I've rotisseried a delicious 3 pound chicken. It's nice looking and is very versatile. My only complaints...it can sometimes get smokey when make pizza at 450 degrees, and the shelf is supposed to pop out when you open the door. That mechanism broke after only 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our counter and a great upgrade from what we had. Haven't tried the rotisserie yet but soon!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly a. repscha

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the oven. It is very easy to use, not so easy to clean.It works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it did great. Watch it when you bake
customer_reviews.text: I started with an 8lb butt the day I got it, and it did great. Watch it when you bake, it cuts the bake time of most things I have tried by 30-50%. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful oven, but I personally don't like the quality
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean accidental cooked on spills, discolors fast. beautiful oven, but I personally don't like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: Ease in set up and operate
customer_reviews.text: Product works great will tell friends of this product is a good investment very versatile used top of oven for heating like a dutch oven and heated vegies covered with foil. only bad review came from delivery when we received it, it was damaged probably from the post office
customer_reviews.author: Linda Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This appliance fills me with happiness and delicious food. Takes a while to learn the settings but when you do it's fantastic. Don't rotisserie a chicken over 5 lbs it won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harris

customer_reviews.title: Its Great
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Toaster oven, and I just love it. Would recommend to any one. Think I will get another for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Zaker

customer_reviews.title: Cooks very good
customer_reviews.text: I like the cooking...it does cook hotter/faster than my old toaster oven. I have not tried the rotisserie function but I will. I wish it was a little wider to hold a 9x13 pan. But so far so good. I hope it lasts and doesn’t konk out in a year!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill N

customer_reviews.title: We love everything about this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this toaster oven. It makes great toast and the rotisserie is assume for small chickens or roasts.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: it is a great rotisserie toaster
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were just a little larger . That said ,it is a great rotisserie toaster , very easy to set up and use .
customer_reviews.author: William McCay

customer_reviews.title: Smoked up the house!
customer_reviews.text: Dislike! If smoked up the house! Two times it was used! The tray collecting the grease had to be removed while cooking the chicken and roast on the rotisserie. That’s why a low rating on the cleaning. Soooooooooo disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: pamela kutz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is an excellent appliance. It is bigger but it's talents are more than a toaster. Food is programmed to cook well. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bussell '76

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working fine I use it mostly for the rotisserie but it is kind of small
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MACHINE. It has completely replaced my Viking gas oven for everything that will fit into it. I LOVE THE ROTISSERIE. I made Easter dinner in this thing - a leg of lamb seasoned up and turning over and over in this thing is amazing. It's a beautiful appliance and I am so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Small

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We love it It gets messy inside so we have to covered it with Aluminum paper. but no more microwaving Rotissery is our preffered part. My beutiful handy wife found a way to rotise 10 Chicken thights in one shot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves electricity and cooks most everything.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second oven, as I moved and left the other for the new owners. I rarely use my large oven, this does it all and saves electricity!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: This oven is too small for a small duck and a big chicken. It doesn’t able cook a 4 bls. Can’t rollover!!! I want to return it! Please approve it!
customer_reviews.author: Yanxiao Chen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect......!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect......! And I think this Rotisserie Convection Toaster is more than perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Glez

customer_reviews.title: Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the toaster oven. It is easy to operate and replaces my oven.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Looper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome results with chicken and beef. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband.....he is the cook......says he has to read the directions before using......good idea......but he's a slow to do it kind of guy.....
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: This Baby Cooks
customer_reviews.text: Not what I call jet-age beautiful. But the damn thing works great. Not a single complaint in the first year.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dan

customer_reviews.title: Lettering on buttons doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I use it daily. My only complaint is that the letters on the start/stop button are already coming off, barely any left.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: And best of all it turns off by itself when it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Heats us fast. And best of all it turns off by itself when it's done. Great buy! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Renee Warden

customer_reviews.title: nice item
customer_reviews.text: The toaster oven is fine, the only thing I did not like was finding out that it is "discontinued" item which I discovered on a different web-site.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Great countertop oven
customer_reviews.text: It has many good features, but like all toaster ovens I've owned, practically impossible to keep really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eastbank

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Is good with baking, broiling, toast and bagels so far. Easy to use and excellent quality of finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Wertheimer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I have used it multiple times now and love it more each time!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Love the rotisserie feature.
customer_reviews.text: Made brownies, rotisserie Cornish hen and lamb, all great! Preheats and cooks so much faster than an oven and doesn't make the house hot.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: We really like this item
customer_reviews.text: We really like this item. It makes a great rotisserie chicken. Also the oven works great for heating up food. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh!
customer_reviews.text: works alright, have had to drastically increase cook times. Not sure I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James Chumbley

customer_reviews.title: metal composition could be better. makes a great chicken
customer_reviews.text: hard to clean the inside. metal composition could be better. makes a great chicken!
customer_reviews.author: nyc Shal

customer_reviews.title: The perfect multifunctional toaster oven plus!
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fantastic. Even heating. EZ to clean. Looks great on counter. Perfect size. Does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Makes rotisserie chicken just like the store in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it best toaster oven ever .We use all the time . Never use big oven anymore
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great features and a very good value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for an older Cuisinart toaster that lasted about 5 years. We've had it for almost a month and last night was the first time we did rotisserie cornish game hens and the result was awesome. The footprint is about the same as the model it replaced but a little taller which makes it easier to clean. I wish it had a light inside like another model that we were looking at, but the price of that one was quite a bit more. We cleaned the interior right after it cooled down when we used the rotisserie function to prevent splatters from getting baked on.
customer_reviews.author: mma2020

customer_reviews.title: Cooked great.
customer_reviews.text: Wished inside a little bigger . 4.8lb chicken slightly hitting bottom as spins. Cooked great though.
customer_reviews.author: 1st time user

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to clean too
customer_reviews.text: Takes longer to cook than timer indicates. But yummy when done! Pretty easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleFolk

product_meta.title: Cuisinart TOB-200N Rotisserie Convection Toaster Oven, , Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style Name:TOB 200NA dozen different ways to cook and space enough to Rotisserie roast a 4-pound chicken makes Cuisinart Rotisserie convection toaster oven in demand for every kitchen. 1875 watts of power heats the unit quickly and ensures precise cooking. Generous size accommodates 6 slices of bread or a 12" pizza. With its brushed-stainless steel counter appeal and easy clean nonstick interior, this is an oven sure to please every creative home cook.1800 watts of power
feature_bullets: Spacious 0.8 cubic-foot capacity oven Fits 12" pizza and 6 slices of bread
12 cooking functions, including rotisserie and convection
Digital controls with large blue backlit display
Rotisserie feature roasts up to a 4-pound chicken or 5-pound duck
Exact heat sensor maintains precise oven temperature
